author: Source: KXXV-TV Waco
title: Man accused of unlawfully installing tracking device on ex-wife's car faces c... - KXXV-TV Waco
text:
According to the arrest affidavit, Stone did not have any legal authority to place a tracking device on the vehicle owned by his his ex-wife. On Oct. 15, the victim told investigators she found an email that showed Larry Stone had bought and activated the GPS tracking device in September.
 KXXV-TV Waco.
